name: Outdoor Research Inception Aerogel Gloves - Unisex
description: Excellent gloves for giving it on alpine routes and high-country adventures. The soft shell fabric moves easily and protects from the elements. Packed with NASA-tested Aerogel insulation, they keep hands reliably warm during long days in the backcountry. Conductive tips on the thumb and index allow the use of touchscreen devices, so you can stay connected where ever your adventure takes you.3-layer soft shell outer is windproof and highly water-resistant.Shell has 4-way stretch for full dexterity.PrimaLoft® Aerogel insulation for maximum warmth.Grid fleece lining holds in heat.Elasticized wrist with hook-and-loop closure seals out the elements.Pull loop can be hooked with a carabiner.
